Time_Series_Analysis.forecast_summary: Demand is expected to rise by ~18% in Q1 2024, with the strongest growth in the automotive sector. Consumer electronics will see steady demand with a 6% increase. A festive season spike is predicted to sustain through Q2 2024.
risk_factors: High dependence on automotive sector demand.
Potential slowdown if raw material shortages persist.
Time_Series_Analysis.recommendation: Increase production readiness for automotive chips by 15% for Q1 and Q2 2024.
